# GDP growth in Q1

## Bundesbank data

```{r}
library(bundesbank)

var_codes <- c("BBNZ1.Q.DE.Y.H.0000.A",
               "BBXN1.Q.BE.N.NAG.B1QG00.0000.Z0N.IND.I00",
               "BBXN1.Q.FR.N.NAG.B1QG00.0000.Z0N.IND.I00"
               )
countries <- c("Germany", 
               "Belgium", 
               "France"
               )

df <- data.frame()
for (i in seq(1, length(var_codes)))
{
  tmp <- getSeries(var_codes[i], start = "2019-09", end = "2020-03")


  df <- rbind(df, data.frame(gdpQ1 = tmp[2, 2] / tmp[1, 2] * 100 - 100, 
                             country = countries[i]))
}
```
